Package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.abstraction

package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.abstraction
Abstraction layer of the Simple Debugger Plugin.

This package contains abstraction and representation classes that decouple the core debugger logic from concrete Eclipse and JDI implementations. It defines common interfaces and representations for breakpoints, target applications, classes, and virtual machines.

Author: Sergei Aidinov
Email: sergey.aydinov@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergei-aydinov/

Since:
1.0
